availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Garrett (Greenup Co. dentist, pvt. 1st Ky. L. A. and 2nd Ky Cav.)

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Greenup County, Kentucky, native. Dentist in 1864. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from August 31, 1863, to March 26, 1864. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private and sergeant from March 26, 1864, to July 14, 1865.

ab.bibl: Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Rolls 0473, 0479.
